body: Looking for a change?  Want to earn more money?   We might have a good offer for you!!!  We are searching for energetic staff, good communication skills, eager to succeed, High English skills.   We offer- ·         1000-3000 pounds/Euro payment for a month. ·         Working in top locations over the country- England, Scotland and Ireland. ·         High quality skin care products. ·         Convenient accommodation- First week FREE of charge. ·         Professional paid training. ·         Taking care of legal issues. ·         Full refund of your journey costs.   If you think that you are suitable for this position, please apply or email your CV to- office.jerichoskincare@gmail.com                              www.jerichoskincare.co.uk
title: Jericho SkinCare-Beauty Adviser-1000-3000GBP/month
